assignments.name: AssignUpdatedIDName
assignments.label: AssignUpdatedIDName

customErrorMessages.errorMessage: A Reason is required when the Stage is 'Disqualified'.
A Reason is required when the Stage is 'Lost'.
You must fill in a yacht to continue

rules.name: Yes_the_yacht_is_filled_in
rules.label: Yes the yacht is filled in

Flow.description: Updating contact type to single PL from Multi PL

formulas.name: ForClientAccountName
formulas.expression: IF ( ISBLANK({!$Record.First_Name__c}) = TRUE, {!$Record.Last_Name__c}&": Client Record", {!$Record.First_Name__c}&" "&{!$Record.Last_Name__c}&": Client Record" )

formulas.name: ForOppNameGenerator
formulas.expression: IF( text({!$Record.Enquiry_Type__c}) = "Buying a yacht", "Broker Purchase: "& {!$Record.Client_and_Company__r.Name}+' '+TEXT(MONTH(TODAY()))+' '+TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())), IF( Text({!$Record.Enquiry_Type__c}) = "Selling a yacht", "Broker Sale: "& {!$Record.Yacht_in_question__r.Name}+' '+TEXT(MONTH(TODAY()))+' '+TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())), "" ))

Flow.label: EnquiryCRUFlow

recordCreates.description: When opp. created then create OppContactRole with Role = Decision Maker.
recordCreates.name: Create_Opp_Con_Role
recordCreates.label: Create Opp Con Role

textTemplates.name: EmailNewEnquiry
textTemplates.text:
You have a new enquiry in your workflow <br>

Type: {!Get_Updated_Enquiry.Enquiry_Type__c} <br>

First Name: {!Get_Updated_Enquiry.First_Name__c} <br>

Last Name: {!Get_Updated_Enquiry.Last_Name__c} <br>

<br>

Salesforce Record: <br>

{!ForEnquiryLink}
